title: Update domain references from jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz to www.jaysports.in

requirements.text: Replace all occurrences of 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' with 'www.jaysports.in' across all frontend files, including HTML meta tags (Open Graph, Twitter Card, canonical links), SEO tags, any hardcoded URL strings, and any other references to the old domain.

quotes: Change the url of this website from jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz to www.jaysports.in

acceptanceCriteria: No occurrence of 'jay-sports-puc.caffeine.xyz' remains in any frontend file.
All Open Graph og:url and og:image tags in frontend/index.html reference 'https://www.jaysports.in'.
All Twitter Card and canonical URL tags reference 'https://www.jaysports.in'.
Google Analytics or any other tracking/config using the old domain is updated to 'www.jaysports.in'.
Any hardcoded domain strings in TSX/TS component files are updated to 'www.jaysports.in'.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not alter the backend or any Motoko files.
nonGoals: DNS configuration or domain registrar settings.
Changing any visual design, layout, or product content.
